K12D0431_H0415:373b-26: lcags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin las /

K12D0431_H0415:374a-0: sngon bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya @374a *//
K12D0431_H0415:374a-1: ste; aom ha na ha na /
K12D0431_H0415:374a-2: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /

K12D0431_H0415:374a-5: zangs ma la sogs pa las byas pa'i zhags pa

K12D0431_H0415:374a-7: byin nas / sngon bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya ste /
K12D0431_H0415:374a-11: kaddhya:kaddhya:/ sarbba dushtam p'a na she bam dha bam dha /
K12D0431_H0415:374a-12: mah'a sa tya te dharmma te sv'ah'a /

K12D0431_H0415:374a-15: de'i rnam par sems kyis dmigs te /
K12D0431_H0415:374a-16: aom he shr'i bha ga w'a na krishn'a tsa la siddhi stvam h'um phat/
K12D0431_H0415:374a-17: de nas sngon bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:374a-18: de bzhin sgrub pa pos nag po la sogs pa'i
K12D0431_H0415:374a-19: dbye bas; mi g-yo ba rnam pa lnga'i ming gis
K12D0431_H0415:374a-20: dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:374a-22: bud med rnams kyi dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur ba bzhag nas /
K12D0431_H0415:374a-23: sindhu ra'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:374a-24: rgyal srid kyi lha mo chen mo'i tshul du slob ma dmigs te /
K12D0431_H0415:374a-25: aom bha ga wa t'i a'a bi sha a'a bi sha aasya hri da yam h'um phat/
K12D0431_H0415:374a-26: lcags la sogs pa'i gri gug de'i lag pa g-yas su sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:374a-27: aom karti ke sarbba m'a ra n'am m'am sam k'arta ya k'arta ya h'um phat/
K12D0431_H0415:374a-28: lag pa g-yon pa mi'i thod pa'am /
K12D0431_H0415:374b-0: rdza las @374b byas pa sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:374b-1: aom badzra ka p'a la sarba sha tr'u n'am raktam dha ra ya dha ra ya h'um phat/
K12D0431_H0415:374b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya ru rnam par bkod nas /
K12D0431_H0415:374b-4: aom he shr'i dve sha badzri siddhi stvam h'um phat/
K12D0431_H0415:374b-5: de bzhin du bud med ni nag mo la sogs
K12D0431_H0415:374b-6: pa'i kha dog gi dbye bas rnal 'byor ma lnga
K12D0431_H0415:374b-7: po rnams kyi ming gis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:374b-8: 'dir shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su thabs kyi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o zhes so //
K12D0431_H0415:374b-9: de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur bar gyur pa ni
K12D0431_H0415:374b-10: bla ma la slob mas gos la sogs pas yang
K12D0431_H0415:374b-12: de la rang yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang /
K12D0431_H0415:374b-13: lang tshos brgyan pa'i shes rab ma dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:374b-15: 'dod kun bde bar rab tu stsol //
K12D0431_H0415:374b-16: bdag ni 'dod pa'i bde don phyir //
K12D0431_H0415:374b-17: mgon po khyod kyis brtsebs zung //
K12D0431_H0415:374b-18: de nas bla ma la phyag 'tshal nas slob ma phyir byung ste /
K12D0431_H0415:374b-19: aom tsanda mah'a ro sha na h'um phat/
K12D0431_H0415:374b-20: zhes pa'i sngags bzlas shing gnas par bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:374b-22: sha la sogs pa rnams kyis bdag nyid mchod nas /
K12D0431_H0415:374b-23: shes rab kyang tshim par byas te; ;yang dag par
K12D0431_H0415:374b-24: sbyor ba las nye bar byung ba'i dkar dmar lo
K12D0431_H0415:374b-25: ma'i skyong bu la sogs par bzhag nas /
K12D0431_H0415:374b-27: de'i lce la mthe bong dang /
K12D0431_H0415:375a-2: h'um phat kyi yi ge bri bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:375a-4: aa ho su kham zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:375a-5: de nas 'di brjod par bya ste /
K12D0431_H0415:375a-6: de ring bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bskyed par bya yi /
K12D0431_H0415:375a-9: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rab
K12D0431_H0415:375a-10: tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob
K12D0431_H0415:375a-11: par 'gyur gyi / 'on kyang khyod kyis dkyil 'khor
K12D0431_H0415:375a-12: ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du 'di smra bar
K12D0431_H0415:375a-13: par 'gyur gyi / mi bya'o // de nas slob
K12D0431_H0415:375a-14: ma'i snying gar ral gri bzhag nas 'di skad brjod
K12D0431_H0415:375a-15: par 'gyur gyi / mi bya'o // par bya ste / gal te smras na de'i tshe /
K12D0431_H0415:375a-16: shin tu rno ba'i ral gri 'di //
K12D0431_H0415:375a-17: khro bo gtum po'i phyag na gnas //
K12D0431_H0415:375a-18: gang gis dam tshig 'jig byed pa //
K12D0431_H0415:375a-19: de la 'di yis mchog tu gcod //
K12D0431_H0415:375a-20: skye ba bye ba stong rnams su //
K12D0431_H0415:375a-21: mi rnams ral gri lag 'phyar bas //
K12D0431_H0415:375a-22: yan lag kun gcod mgo bo ni //
K12D0431_H0415:375a-23: 'di yis mchog tu gcod par byed //
K12D0431_H0415:375a-24: gal te dam tshig 'di nyid kyis //
K12D0431_H0415:375a-26: de nas slob mas brjod par bya ste /
K12D0431_H0415:375a-28: de nas gdong g-yogs bcings nas /
K12D0431_H0415:375a-29: dkyil 'khor du me tog dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:375a-30: de nas gdod g-yogs bsal nas /
K12D0431_H0415:375a-31: dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan par bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-0: gang gis @375b mtshan ma de nas bstan par bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-1: de nas slob ma la shes rab ma de sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-3: bsten byar sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-4: rmongs pa gang zhig 'da' byed pa //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-5: de la mchog gi dngos grub med //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-6: da nas dga' ba bzhi'i rnam par dbye ba bla mas rna bar smra bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-7: de na bla ma phyi rol du byung nas //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-8: shes rab gcer bu tsog bus gsang gnas mdzub mos bstan nas /
K12D0431_H0415:375b-10: nga las mi gtsang ba dang ni //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-11: bshang gci rakta za ba dang //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-12: bha ga'i gnas la 'o byed dam //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-13: sgrub pa pos smra bar bya ste /
K12D0431_H0415:375b-14: khyod las mi gtsang bza' ba ni //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-15: ci yi phyir ni bdag mi spro //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-16: ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-17: bdag gis mi mo kun gus bya //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-20: bde ba thams cad yang dag ldan //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-21: gang zhig cho gas sten byed na //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-22: bdag ni dngos grub stsol mdzad ma //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-23: blo ldan brtan par rab sbyor bas //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-24: padma bya ba ji bzhin gyis //
K12D0431_H0415:375b-25: rang nyid khor bo gtum po chen por gnas pas bde ba chen po ste /
K12D0431_H0415:375b-26: de nas sgrub pa po bdag nyid khro bo gtum po chen po'i rnam par bsams la /
K12D0431_H0415:375b-27: shes rab kyang zhe sdang rdo rje ma'i tshul gyis
K12D0431_H0415:375b-28: yang dag par sbyor bas dga' ba bzhi mtshon par
K12D0431_H0415:375b-29: bya'o // de nas yongs su rdzogs pa dang //
K12D0431_H0415:376a-0: @376a *// bla ma la sogs pa la chang dang /

K12D0431_H0415:376a-3: dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las /

K12D0431_H0415:376a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa /
K12D0431_H0415:376a-6: ji ltar sgom pa po yi phyir //
K12D0431_H0415:376a-7: khro chen gtum po bsgom par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:376a-8: sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar bya //
K12D0431_H0415:376a-9: dbang phyug dam pa bshad du gsol //
K12D0431_H0415:376a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0431_H0415:376a-11: yid dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs ni //
K12D0431_H0415:376a-12: bar du gcod ba kun bral bar //
K12D0431_H0415:376a-13: ji ltar rnyed pa'i stan nyid la //
K12D0431_H0415:376a-14: de la mnyam gzhag brtag par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:376a-15: dang po byams pa bsgom par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:376a-16: gnyis par snying rje bsgom par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:376a-17: gsum pa la ni dga' ba bsgom //
K12D0431_H0415:376a-18: kun gyi mtha' la btang snyoms so //
K12D0431_H0415:376a-19: de nas rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon las padma dang /
K12D0431_H0415:376a-21: nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis mdun
K12D0431_H0415:376a-22: du bsam gtan gyi khro bo gtum po bsams nas
K12D0431_H0415:376a-23: / yid kyis mchod pa bya ste; mkhas pas me tog la sogs pas //
K12D0431_H0415:376a-24: yid kyis de rnams mchod par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:376a-25: de mdun sdig pa bshags par bgyi //
K12D0431_H0415:376a-26: bsod nams la yang rjes yi rang //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-0: gsum @376b la skyabs su 'gro bar bya //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-1: bskul zhing gsol ba rab tu 'debs //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-2: bdag nyid yongs su 'bul ba dang //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-3: bsod nams yongs su bsngo bar bya //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-4: de nas smon lam btab nas ni //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-5: byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-6: de nas phyag ni btsal byas la //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-7: 'od zer rnams kyis slar yang bsdu //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-8: mkhas pas stong par bsams pa ni //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-9: sngags 'di nyid ni brjod par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-10: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham/
K12D0431_H0415:376b-11: rab tu 'bad pa'i h'um yig ni //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-12: 'od zer de yis bsregs par bsam //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-13: ga bur bsregs pa ji bzhin bsam //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-14: 'od zer la yang rnam mi rtog /
K12D0431_H0415:376b-15: thams cad nam mkha' ji bzhin du //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-16: skad cig gis ni rnam par bsgom //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-17: dri med dag pa'i shel bzhin du //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-18: rang lus rnam par bsgom par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-19: sngon du bsgom bya phyi nas ni //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-20: yam ram bam lam bzhi rnams las //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-21: yongs gyur bsgom bya rlung dang ni //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-22: me dang chu dang sa rnams so //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-23: bhrum yig de las bsgom bya ba //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-24: gzhal yas khang du rab tu sgom //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-25: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-26: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-27: de yi dbus su bsam bya ba //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-29: pam yig sa bon las byung ba //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-30: de la aam yig las byung zla //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-31: ram yig las byung nyi ma ste //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-32: de steng h'um yig las kyang slar //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-33: des bskyed mi bskyod pa ru bsam //
K12D0431_H0415:376b-34: m'a ma k'i bcas yang dag sbyor //
K12D0431_H0415:377a-0: @377a *// de la rim bzhin rnal 'byor dbang //
K12D0431_H0415:377a-1: de yi spyi bo la thim nas //
K12D0431_H0415:377a-2: skar mda' ji bzhin sbyor ba yis //
K12D0431_H0415:377a-3: m'a ma k'i yi bha gar bsam //
K12D0431_H0415:377a-4: de las khu ba ro mnyam gyur; ;lhung gyur de yi bha ga'i nang //
K12D0431_H0415:377a-5: gtum po'i gzugs su gyur nas ni //
K12D0431_H0415:377a-6: bha ga'i mtha' las nges byung nas //

K12D0431_H0415:377a-8: bsnun nas phyi nas rab tu bza'//

K12D0431_H0415:377a-12: ma dang yang dag rab 'dod bya //
K12D0431_H0415:377a-13: des kyang 'khyud par bsam bya ba //
K12D0431_H0415:377a-14: zhe sdang rdo rje ma yi gzugs //
K12D0431_H0415:377a-15: phyag g-yas na ni ral gri 'phyar //

K12D0431_H0415:377a-17: sdigs mdzub kyis ni sdigs par byed //

K12D0431_H0415:377a-20: bdud bzhi rnam par nyed par mdzad //

K12D0431_H0415:377a-23: pus mo g-yon pa'i rtse mos gnas //
K12D0431_H0415:377a-24: mi bskyod sngon pos dbu rgyan mdzad //
K12D0431_H0415:377a-25: rin po che yi cod pan can //
K12D0431_H0415:377a-26: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan gyur pa'i //
K12D0431_H0415:377a-27: gzhon nu zur phud lnga dang ldan //
K12D0431_H0415:377a-28: brgyad gnyis lo yi rnam pa can //
K12D0431_H0415:377a-29: spyan gnyis dmar po gtso bo yi //
K12D0431_H0415:377a-30: sems nyid brtan pas bsgom par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-0: @377b bdag nyid khro bo gtum grub nas //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-1: de nas bsrub pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-2: shar du mi g-yo dkar po spro //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-3: me mtshams gti mug rdo rje ma //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-4: ston ka'i z'a 'od dang mtshungs spro //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-5: lho ru mi g-yo ser po spro //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-6: phra ma rdo rje bden bral ser //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-7: mi g-yo dmar po nub tu spro //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-8: rlung du 'dod chags rdo rje ma //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-9: mi g-yo ljang gu byang phyogs su //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-10: dbang ldan phrag dog rdo rje ma //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-11: phyi nas shes rab dang bcas des //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-12: rang gi mgrin pa las byung ba'i //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-13: lha mo rnams kyis glu yi bskul //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-14: ba hu mee tri tu bi bardzdza aa ho hi m'a shunna sa h'a ba to //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-15: dzdzu bi yo ae phi t'a mi sa ppa dza /
K12D0431_H0415:377b-17: gti mug rdo rje mas so //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-18: m'a ka ru na tsi aa phitta hi ba hu
K12D0431_H0415:377b-19: m'a ho hi tu shunna m'a mo dzu de ha
K12D0431_H0415:377b-20: / su dukkhi aa hu ai dzib bi hunna:/
K12D0431_H0415:377b-21: phra ma rdo rje ma yis so //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-22: k'i sa tu ha ri sa /
K12D0431_H0415:377b-23: bi ho hi aa shunna hi ka ra si pa be sha /
K12D0431_H0415:377b-24: to dzdzu ni manna na ka ri /
K12D0431_H0415:377b-25: aa manni aatstsha ai lo a'a shi sha /
K12D0431_H0415:377b-27: dzob na matstshi au pa khe aa nashpha la shunna: ae bitte /
K12D0431_H0415:377b-28: shunna sa h'a ba bi go ai aa ka ra hi tu mo ae sam ma ghitti /
K12D0431_H0415:377b-30: khyab bdag byams pa rnam spangs nas //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-31: stong pa'i rang bzhin du ma mdzad //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-32: khyod dang rnam bral bdag 'gum pas //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-33: 'gro kun stong par ma mdzad cig /
K12D0431_H0415:377b-34: gti mug rdo rje mas so //
K12D0431_H0415:377b-35: snying rje'i sems bral bdag 'gum pas //
K12D0431_H0415:378a-0: khyab bdag stong par ma mdzad cig @378a *//
K12D0431_H0415:378a-1: bdag gis lus ni sdug bsngal bas //
K12D0431_H0415:378a-2: 'tsho ba dang bral ma mdzad cig /
K12D0431_H0415:378a-3: phra ma rdo rje mas so //
K12D0431_H0415:378a-4: ci ste mkhas ba khyod nyid ni //
K12D0431_H0415:378a-5: dga' ba spangs nas stong par 'jug /
K12D0431_H0415:378a-6: 'jig rten ma lus pa rnams dang //
K12D0431_H0415:378a-7: bdag gi yid ni khyod la sdod //
K12D0431_H0415:378a-8: 'dod chags rdo rje ma yis so //
K12D0431_H0415:378a-9: lang tsho dang ldan btang snyoms pa'i //

K12D0431_H0415:378a-11: stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la //

K12D0431_H0415:396a-24: zhags pa phyag na bsnams pa /

K12D0431_H0415:401a-16: gang gi ming yin pa de 'ong bar 'gyur ro //

K12D0431_H0415:401a-22: lan tshva la yongs su bzlas nas gang gi rkang
K12D0431_H0415:401a-23: pa'i sen mo la byin na de dbang du byed
K12D0431_H0415:401b-0: do // ba lang gi @401b spu'i thag pa sngags
K12D0431_H0415:401b-1: kyis mngon par bsngags nas gang gi mgul du bcings
K12D0431_H0415:401b-2: pa de ba lang du 'gyur ro //

K12D0431_H0415:401b-4: nas mngon par bzlas pa de 'ong bar 'gyur ro
K12D0431_H0415:401b-5: // zhum bu'i spu'i thag pa gang gi mgul bar bcings pa de zhum bur 'gyur ro //

K12D0431_H0415:401b-10: gang gi spu la sogs pa'i srad bus byas pas de dang /

K12D0431_H0415:402a-0: sgrubs shig h'um phat/ ces pa brgya rtsa @402a *//
K12D0431_H0415:402a-1: brgyad sngags nas dben pa'i phyogs su bsgrubs pas de'i mngon par 'dod pa 'grub bo //

K12D0431_H0415:402a-8: skyes 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i dbus su bri bar

K12D0431_H0415:402b-29: sus kyang ji ltar mi shes bya //

K12D0431_H0415:410b-8: zad pa ma yin par gyur pa /

K12D0431_H0415:410b-10: kyi dngos grub yang dag par grub par byed do
K12D0431_H0415:410b-13: yang dag par sbyor ba'i bde ba'i ros dga' ba'i sems gang yin pa'o //
K12D0431_H0415:410b-14: zla ba'i khyad par gyi dga' ba mchog gi snying po de mi g-yo ba zhes gsungs so //
K12D0431_H0415:410b-15: zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs
K12D0431_H0415:410b-16: pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las
K12D0431_H0415:410b-17: / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rim par phye ba ste bcu drug pa'o ////
K12D0431_H0415:410b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa /
K12D0431_H0415:410b-19: mgon po 'dir ni khu khrag sbyor //
K12D0431_H0415:410b-20: ling ga bha ga nu ma rnams //
K12D0431_H0415:410b-21: rab tu 'phel bar byed nus dang //
K12D0431_H0415:410b-22: nang dang rgas pa 'joms pa dang //
K12D0431_H0415:410b-23: bud med yid ni dbang gyur dang //
K12D0431_H0415:410b-24: mo gsham nyid du bya ba dang //
K12D0431_H0415:410b-25: khu ba bcing dang khrag 'bab pa'i; ;sbyor ba yang ni bshad du gsol //
K12D0431_H0415:410b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K12D0431_H0415:410b-27: lha mo legs so legs par byas //
K12D0431_H0415:410b-28: khyod kyis nga la gsol btab gang //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-2: 'jig rten dngos grub don phyir nyon //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-3: dang por lus ni byas nas ni //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-4: phyi nas las ni yang dag brtsam //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-5: dper na gos ni dkar byas la /
K12D0431_H0415:411a-6: tshon gyis kha dog mchog 'bar ltar //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-7: 'bras bu gsum gyi thang bzung nas //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-8: ya baksha ra pa l'a saksham/
K12D0431_H0415:411a-9: bza' bya bu ram dang bcas btung //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-10: srin bu ma zhu rab sbyangs nas //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-11: ka ta kya khu mar khu dang //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-12: hi la mo tsi sen dha ba //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-13: btung bya byugs nas nyi mas bdug /
K12D0431_H0415:411a-14: shig dang srin bral lus su 'gyur //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-15: ke ta kya khu til mar dang //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-16: lan tshva dang byas btung byas nas //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-17: nyi ma la 'chag sbyor ba yis //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-18: lan tshva rnams ni nyams par 'gyur //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-19: hi la mi tsi khu cung zad //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-20: sen dha ba dang yang dag ldan //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-21: grib ma la ni gnas byas na //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-22: mkhris pa rnams ni sel bar byed //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-23: ke ta kya khu te la dang //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-24: ku tsa m'a la ba'i lo ma //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-25: btung ba'i sbyor ba 'di nyid ni //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-26: tshil ni sbyong bar the tshom med //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-27: pha tha se myug khu ba dang //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-28: lan tshvar bcas pa btung byas na //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-29: srin bu phra mo 'joms par byed //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-31: re re'ang nyi ma gnyis su bya //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-32: nyes pa sbyangs nas phyi nas brtsam //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-33: de yis de nyid 'bras bu ster //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-34: dga' ma gzhan du de 'bras med //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-35: mon tsa ra shun phye ma yi //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-36: thug pa tsha mo btung bar bya //
K12D0431_H0415:411a-37: lan bdun du ni sngags byas nas //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-0: snga mo 'am ni zas @411b dus su //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-1: nyin re ji bzhin ji srid 'tshor //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-3: aom tsanda mah'a ro shi na ai dam di bhya mri tam me ku ru h'um phat/
K12D0431_H0415:411b-4: na ri ke le'i nang rul dang //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-5: ma he ye ni mar gsar dang; ;'bras bu zhag lon dang ldan pa //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-6: phag las byung ba'i tshil gyis ni //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-7: ling ga rna ba nu ma dang //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-8: bha ga rnams kyang rnam par mnye //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-9: lus kun kyang ni rnam mnyes na //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-10: rnam par 'phel bar the tshom med //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-11: sen mo dang ni bral byas nas //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-12: mdzub mo yis ni nyed par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-13: yo na'i dbus su rab tu nyed //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-15: se 'bru'i shun pa phye ma ni //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-16: yungs kar til mar la btsos nas //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-18: mundi r'i thad sna yis btung //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-19: yungs kar dkar po shu thag dang //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-20: rta dri dang ni bri ha ti //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-21: phye ma yis ni nyed par byed //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-22: ling ga nu ma rna ba 'phel //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-23: glang chen pi pi ling dang ni //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-24: aa pa ra dzi dkar po yis //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-25: de bzhin ma he'i mar gsar gyis //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-26: ling ga mnyes na 'phel bar byed //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-27: se ba la dang ka tu dang /
K12D0431_H0415:411b-28: ro hi n'i dang ma he yi //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-29: mar gsar byugs pas ling ga 'phel //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-30: dhu tu ra khu rta dri'i tsa //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-31: gnur nas ma he'i mar dang bsres //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-32: dhu tu ra yi 'bras nang du //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-33: nyin mtshan du ni gzhag par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-34: de nas ling ga ma he yi //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-35: mar gyis lan gcig brtan par nyed //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-36: sngon bzhin du ni zhag gsum du //
K12D0431_H0415:411b-37: byugs shing mnyes pas 'phel bar byed //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-0: @412a *// aindra go pa'i phye ma dang //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-1: ma he'i mar gyis bsgrub par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-2: yo ni'i nang du byugs gyur na //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-3: yo ni'i lhod pa dam par 'gyur //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-5: pad rtsa au shi ra dang ni //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-6: mon lug til mar nang du btso //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-7: de yis bha ga ling ga dag /
K12D0431_H0415:412a-8: dri ngan dang ni lhod pa dang //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-9: nad la sogs pa 'joms par byed //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-10: nim pa'i shun pa'i thang gis ni //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-11: bha ga la ni khrus byas bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-12: nim pa'i shun pas bdug byas na //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-13: 'di ni gzhon dang dri bzang dang //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-14: skal bzang yon tan dang ldan 'gyur //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-15: ba bla yi ni cha lnga dang /
K12D0431_H0415:412a-16: kam shu ka ksh'a ra cha gcig /
K12D0431_H0415:412a-17: ya baksha ra cha gcig dang //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-18: chu shing ksha ra cha gcig dang //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-19: chu nang mnyes nas byugs tsam gyis //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-20: bha ga mchan dang skyes gnas kyi //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-21: spu ni ltung bar byed pa yin; ;de nas ha la ha la'i sbrul //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-22: mjug ma'i phye ma dang bsres nas //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-23: tsha ba'i til mar zhag bdun bzhag /
K12D0431_H0415:412a-24: de yis ling ga la sogs mnye //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-26: ma he phag dang glang chen dang //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-27: karka ta yi zhag dang tshil //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-28: nu ma la sogs nyed byas 'phel //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-29: sna ma'i me tog til dang btags //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-30: bha ga la ni grul byas na //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-31: steng du mtho bar byed pa yin //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-32: ma he yi ni mar gsar dang //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-33: shu dag ru rta ba l'a dang //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-34: n'a ga ba las nyed byas na //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-35: nu ma 'phel bar byed pa yin //
K12D0431_H0415:412a-36: chu dron gyis ni khrus byas la //
K12D0431_H0415:412b-0: ling ga sngon bzhin @412b 'phel ba nyams //
K12D0431_H0415:412b-2: ba yi mar dang btung byas na //
K12D0431_H0415:412b-3: dus ldan dus la sbrum par 'gyur //
K12D0431_H0415:412b-4: rta dri'i rtsa ba mar 'thungs nas //
K12D0431_H0415:412b-5: sbrum ma nyid du 'gyur ba yin //
K12D0431_H0415:412b-6: ba la aa ti ba la dang /
K12D0431_H0415:412b-9: ma kshi ka'i sbrang dang bcas pa 'thungs na sbrum par 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:412b-10: ba bla'i rtsa ba chu dang btags nas 'thungs na /
K12D0431_H0415:412b-11: khrag 'dzag pa chad par 'gyur ro; ;nas kyi phye dang /
K12D0431_H0415:412b-15: mar rang gis lus la dril phyis byas na bzang por 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:412b-16: ba r'a ha kran t'a'i rtsa ba dus ldan ma'i rna ba la btags na sbrum par 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:412b-17: ka lam bi'i lo ma zos na khams 'phel lo //
K12D0431_H0415:412b-20: dkar mar zos na khams 'phel lo //
K12D0431_H0415:412b-21: bud med kyi dri chen dang dri chu mnyes nas 'thungs na khu ba 'phel lo //
K12D0431_H0415:412b-22: skyu ru ra'i phye ma chu'am /
K12D0431_H0415:412b-24: sbrang dang sbyar te phyi dro zos na /
K12D0431_H0415:412b-26: shes rab kyang skye bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:412b-27: skyu ru ra'i phye ma til phye ma dang mnyam
K12D0431_H0415:412b-28: po mar dang sbrang bza' bar byas na'ang 'bras bu
K12D0431_H0415:412b-29: de ji lta ba bzhin no //
K12D0431_H0415:412b-30: ga ra kha tan tu la'i rtsa ba dang /
K12D0431_H0415:412b-34: bu ram ro mnyam por byas nas bza' ba zos na /
K12D0431_H0415:412b-36: aa rdzu na'i shun pa'i phye ma 'o ma dang
K12D0431_H0415:412b-37: sbyar nyin re zhing bza' bar byas na lo gcig
K12D0431_H0415:412b-38: gi sbyor bas tshe lo sum brgya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:413a-2: ba ku so ma ra dza'i phye ma zho gnyis tho rangs 'thungs nas /
K12D0431_H0415:413a-3: zhu ba dang 'o ma'i bza' ba zos na /
K12D0431_H0415:413a-4: zla ba gcig byas na tshe lo lnga brgya 'tsho'o /
K12D0431_H0415:413a-5: b'a gu tsi zho gnyis dang /
K12D0431_H0415:413a-9: gang dang yang rung ba dang sbyar 'thungs na zla ba drug gi sbyor bas gzhon nur 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:413a-10: mun da ri'i phye ma mar dang zos na /
K12D0431_H0415:413a-11: zhag bdun phrag gsum gyis lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam par 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:413a-12: sa na bi dz'a'i phye ma srang gcig dang /
K12D0431_H0415:413a-13: rakta sh'a la srang gcig dang /
K12D0431_H0415:413a-14: ba kha dog gcig pa'i 'o ma kham phor do btso bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:413a-15: dang por 'o ma kham phor gang zad pa dang blangs nas /
K12D0431_H0415:413a-16: sa na la sogs pa de la byin nas btso bor bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:413a-17: de nas bza' bar bya'o; ;sman zhu nas 'o ma dang bza' bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:413a-18: rlung dang nyi ma spangs te zhag bdun phrag gsum
K12D0431_H0415:413a-19: du ji srid ji lta ba de bzhin du phyin
K12D0431_H0415:413a-20: nas bya'o // de nas skra la sogs pa ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:413a-23: gnyer ma bral nas lo brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:413a-24: rakta autstsha ta'i rtsa ba dang /
K12D0431_H0415:413a-26: sbrang rnams zhum bu'i lag pa tsam bza' bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:413b-0: lcags kyi @413b phye ma rnams sbrang dang /
K12D0431_H0415:413b-2: au dum wa ra'i 'bras bu'i tshad tsam ril bu byas nas /
K12D0431_H0415:413b-3: de nas ril bu re re nyin re zhing bza' bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:413b-4: zla ba gcig gis lo sum brgya 'tsho'o //
K12D0431_H0415:413b-5: gzhon nu ma srang gcig dang /
K12D0431_H0415:413b-6: mar dang bcas pa bza' bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:413b-7: zhag bdun gyi tshe lo brgya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:413b-13: bu ram dang bza' bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:413b-15: bha dra la'i phye ma sum 'gyur dang /
K12D0431_H0415:413b-17: de bzhin du chu la sogs pa dang bza' bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:413b-19: rnam pa thams cad du bdag nyid lha'i rnam par
K12D0431_H0415:413b-20: bsgoms nas gtum po'i sngags kyis sman yang dag par
K12D0431_H0415:413b-22: zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal gtum po chen po'i rgyud las /
K12D0431_H0415:413b-23: khams la sogs pa 'phel ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu bdun pa'o ////
K12D0431_H0415:413b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0431_H0415:413b-25: ae randa'i rtsa ba rang skyur la btags nas spyi bo mnyes nas /
K12D0431_H0415:413b-26: mgo bo'i zug rdu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:413b-29: mi'i chu bsres nas rgyam tsha dang bcas pas rna
K12D0431_H0415:413b-30: ba bkang na rna ba'i nad zhi bar 'gyur ro
K12D0431_H0415:413b-31: // sdom skam po til mar du bcug nas /
K12D0431_H0415:414a-0: zil pa'i chu la ril bu byas @414a *//
K12D0431_H0415:414a-1: nas de yis mig sman byas na /
K12D0431_H0415:414a-2: mig gi nad thams cad sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:414a-4: pi pi ling gi mig sman gyis kyang ngo //
K12D0431_H0415:414a-6: sbrang gis mig sman byas na srod long sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:414a-7: gho sha pha lam gi dri ma snom zhing /
K12D0431_H0415:414a-8: kam k'a lam ko'i rtsa ba dang /
K12D0431_H0415:414a-10: sna yis btung bar byas na mkhris nad mig ser sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:414a-11: le brgan rtsi'i khu ba dang /
K12D0431_H0415:414a-13: se 'bru'i me tog gi khu ba dang gcig tu
K12D0431_H0415:414a-14: byas nas snar blugs na sna khrag 'dzag pa 'chad
K12D0431_H0415:414a-15: do // k'ashtha au dum b'a ri'i rtsa ba dang;
K12D0431_H0415:414a-16: 'bras kyi chus kha nas khrag 'dzag pa 'chad par
K12D0431_H0415:414a-17: do // byed do // se pa li k'a'i rtsa ba ldad na mgul 'gags sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:414a-18: ra ti'i rtsa bas so 'cha' ba sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:414a-21: sdig pa'i rkang pa btsos nas rkang mthil la mnye bar byas na /
K12D0431_H0415:414a-22: so 'cha' ba rnam par sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:414a-23: la phug gi sa bon dang /
K12D0431_H0415:414a-24: pri yang ku dang; tsandan dmar po dang /
K12D0431_H0415:414a-25: ru rta dang btags nas dril phyis byas na /
K12D0431_H0415:414a-26: khyi rdo la sogs pa 'joms par byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:414a-27: ha ri na'i sha skam po srang gcig dang /
K12D0431_H0415:414a-28: ra'i 'o ma btung bar byas na /
K12D0431_H0415:414a-29: zad byed kyi nad sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:414a-31: 'bras zan gyi bza' bas btsan thabs su 'khru ba sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:414b-0: 'bras zan chu dang bcas @414b pa grang mos kyang de bzhin du sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:414b-1: ru rta'i shun pa cha gnyis dang /
K12D0431_H0415:414b-4: sgog skya rnams cha re ba'i dar ba dang 'thungs na lto 'gyings pa sel lo //
K12D0431_H0415:414b-12: cha mnyam du dgongs ka zos na blo dang dbugs mi bde bsel lo //
K12D0431_H0415:414b-13: aa ru ra'i phye ma dang /
K12D0431_H0415:414b-14: sbrang gis kyang de bzhin no //
K12D0431_H0415:414b-15: seng ldeng gi lo ma dang /
K12D0431_H0415:414b-17: nas kyi myu gu bca' bar byas na lto ba'i nad sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:414b-20: zho'i thug pa lan tshva dang bcas 'thungs pas rab tu tsha ba'i chu nad rnam par sel lo //
K12D0431_H0415:414b-22: ya baksha ra dang cha mnyam du bza' zhing /
K12D0431_H0415:414b-23: sho bha dza na'i rtsa ba'i chang 'thungs na chu so'i rde'u 'byin par byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:414b-27: dar ba 'thungs na mcher pa skrangs pa'i nad sel lo //
K12D0431_H0415:414b-29: bu ram bza' bar byas na tsha ba sel bar byed do; ;ya baksha ra dang /
K12D0431_H0415:414b-30: zho 'thungs par byas na pe snabs 'khru ba'i nad sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:414b-33: rgyam tshva dang bcas pa'i thug pa dron mo 'thungs na me 'bab ba dang /
K12D0431_H0415:414b-34: srin bu'i nad sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:414b-36: bu ram gyi bza' bas 'brum nag gi nad sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:415a-0: sga skya'i bza' bas be snabs 'khru @415a *//
K12D0431_H0415:415a-3: yung ba btags nas byugs na rngu shu sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:415a-4: 'di yis de bzhin du me dbal dang /
K12D0431_H0415:415a-6: khyi rma la sogs pa'ang sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:415a-7: k'a sha mar dha'i rtsa ba rang skyur la btags nas kyang de bzhin no //
K12D0431_H0415:415a-8: bu ram dang tsa ba'i mar khu 'thungs na glo dang /
K12D0431_H0415:415a-9: dbugs gdug pa sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:415a-10: aa rdzu na'i shun pa dang /
K12D0431_H0415:415a-11: mar la sogs pa zos ni snying gi zug rdu sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:415a-12: ka ped bsregs la bu ram dang bza' bar byas
K12D0431_H0415:415a-13: na khrag tu 'khru ba sel bar byed do; ;ma
K12D0431_H0415:415a-14: tu lung ka'i khu ba bu ram dang btung bar
K12D0431_H0415:415a-15: byas na zug rdu sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:415a-16: bu ram dang bca' sga snar blugs na cham pa'i nad thams cad sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:415a-18: sbrang gis mig sman byas na mig nad thams cad sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:415a-22: d'ur ba'i rtsa ba 'khar ba'i nang du mnyes nas
K12D0431_H0415:415a-23: mig sman byas na zug rdu sel bar byed do
K12D0431_H0415:415a-29: mdze la sogs pa rnam par sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:415a-30: 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma mar dang /
K12D0431_H0415:415a-31: sbrang dang bza' bar byas na nad thams cad sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:415a-32: aa ru ra'i phye ma dang /
K12D0431_H0415:415a-35: phyi dro'i dus su ldags na /
K12D0431_H0415:415b-0: rlung dang @415b bad kan sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:415b-1: ba sha ka'i yan lag lnga dang /
K12D0431_H0415:415b-4: pi pi ling rnams bskams nas phye mar byas te /
K12D0431_H0415:415b-8: de nas dgongs mo zos na bad kan rnams sel zhing shin tu dbyangs snyan par byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:415b-15: seng ldeng rnams sbrang la ril bu byas nas bza'
K12D0431_H0415:415b-16: bar byas na de lta bu'i 'bras bu nyid do
K12D0431_H0415:415b-20: rgyam tshva dang cha mnyam por bza' bar byas na ma zhu ba thams cad sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:415b-21: sle tres kyi khu ba dang /
K12D0431_H0415:415b-22: sbrang 'thungs par byas na chu nad thams cad sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:415b-24: pi pi ling gi phye ma mar dang /
K12D0431_H0415:415b-25: sbrang dang 'thungs par byas na tsha ba dang /
K12D0431_H0415:415b-27: glo la sogs pa sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:415b-29: sha ra pung ka'i rtsa ba 'bras khu grang mos btags nas byugs par bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:415b-30: sle tres kyi rtsa ba bza' bar byas na rtsa nang gi rma 'tsho bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:415b-32: ya baksha ra bza' bar byas na ltogs pa sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:415b-33: dza yan ta yi sa khon dang /
K12D0431_H0415:415b-34: pho ba ris nyi ma gsum 'thungs par byas na sdig pa'i nad 'brum nag sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:416a-0: bhring gi r'a dza'i khu ba @416a *//
K12D0431_H0415:416a-1: dang; aa mra'i sa bon dang /
K12D0431_H0415:416a-2: lcags kyi phye ma rang skyur dang bsnyal nas bsing bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:416a-3: de nas gu gul gyis skra la bdugs nas de yis mnye bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:416a-4: de nas zhag bdun bcings nas gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:416a-7: bhring gi r'a dza'i khu ba dag pa'i mar la
K12D0431_H0415:416a-8: btsos nas snar blugs na zhag bdun gyis skra'i mdog
K12D0431_H0415:416a-11: randa dag gi thang bcu drug 'gyur gyi bar du cha gcig lus kyi bar du bskol bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:416a-12: de nas ghunydza dkar po'i phye ma blugs nas dkrug par bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:416a-13: de nas 'bru mar kham phor gang dang btso bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:416a-14: 'dis skra dang mnyes pas skra kha dog nag por 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:416a-15: bhu mi bi d'a ri dang /
K12D0431_H0415:416a-17: mu zi dang mnyam po phye mar byas nas sdong bu'i nang du bcug nas /
K12D0431_H0415:416a-18: sdong bu'i kha thur du bstan nas /
K12D0431_H0415:416a-19: me sbar nas rim par tsha ba'i 'bru mar blangs nas /
K12D0431_H0415:416a-20: rtag tu thigs pa gnyis sna yis 'thungs na /
K12D0431_H0415:416a-22: gnyer ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:416a-23: de'i khu bas mdze la byugs shing mnyes na mdze nad sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:416a-24: mar gsar pa yis mnyes nas /
K12D0431_H0415:416a-25: ldong ros drug nam gcig dang bcas te dngul chu srang gcig dang /
K12D0431_H0415:416a-27: lo ni a'i gong bu dang /
K12D0431_H0415:416a-28: lugs kong gi kha bkab nas /
K12D0431_H0415:416b-0: bum pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi @416b nang du bye ma dang bcas pa me la bsreg par bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:416b-1: dngul chu bcing ba bza' bar byas na zad byed la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:416b-2: ba'i be'u skyes pa'i dang po'i lci ba blangs nas
K12D0431_H0415:416b-3: ril bu byas te punda ta ga ra'i rtsa ba
K12D0431_H0415:416b-4: dang mnyes nas bcings par bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:416b-5: sor gcig zos nas dug zos na'ang gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:416b-7: b'i dza p'u ra ka'i sa bon dang; sha ri
K12D0431_H0415:416b-8: sha'i sa bon dang btags nas ra'i 'o ma la
K12D0431_H0415:416b-9: btso bar byas nas mar dang bza' bar byas na
K12D0431_H0415:416b-10: zla ba phyed du ltogs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:416b-13: autpa la dang spang spos dang /
K12D0431_H0415:416b-15: de rnams kyis byugs na skra srab mo yang tshan mthug por 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:416b-16: khyi'i mche ba du ba'i nang du bsregs nas 'o
K12D0431_H0415:416b-17: ma dang mar dang bcas pas mnye bar byas na
K12D0431_H0415:416b-18: skra ma skyes pa'ang skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:416b-19: na ri ke la'i chu la skyes bu'i dbang po
K12D0431_H0415:416b-20: cung zad bar du gzhag nas su ra su na
K12D0431_H0415:416b-21: phye ma byin na skyes bu'i dbang po shu ba'i
K12D0431_H0415:416b-23: rgyal gyi zla ba la bhring ga r'a dza'i rtsa
K12D0431_H0415:416b-24: ba rang gi khu ba dang sbyar nas byugs na
K12D0431_H0415:416b-25: de bzhin no // ka ra b'i ra dkar po'i 'khri shing dang /
K12D0431_H0415:416b-26: rtsangs pa'i khrag gis mnye bar byas na /
K12D0431_H0415:416b-28: bhring ga r'a dza mnyes nas rab tu byugs na 'ang de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:416b-29: zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs
K12D0431_H0415:416b-30: pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las
K12D0431_H0415:417a-1: thams cad 'phel ba gzhom pa'i rim par phye ba ste bco brgyad pa'o ////
K12D0431_H0415:417a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0431_H0415:417a-3: aa pa ra dzi ka dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /
K12D0431_H0415:417a-4: khu ba ril bu byas nas thig le byas na bud med dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:417a-8: sbrang ling+ga la byugs nas mnyes nas bud med la 'dod pa byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:417a-10: chu skyes kyi ge sar btags nas rgyal mtshan la byugs te danda autpa la dang /
K12D0431_H0415:417a-12: go la byin na'ang de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:417a-17: go la byin na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:417a-18: byugs nas 'dod pa byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:417a-19: bu chung so ma skyes pa'i lce blangs te /
K12D0431_H0415:417a-22: skar ma rgyal la ril bu byas nas thig le byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:417a-23: gi wam gi rang byung gi me tog la sbangs nas thig le byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:417a-24: dur khrod kyi du bas bdugs nas bud med la bsnun na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:417a-25: ma y'u ra shi kha dang /
K12D0431_H0415:417a-27: ro'i me tog snying pa skam po'i phye ma gang
K12D0431_H0415:417a-28: gi spyi bor byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro
K12D0431_H0415:417a-30: bya rog gi brun btags nas bza' ba dang /
K12D0431_H0415:417a-31: btung bar byin na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:417b-0: bishnu kr'an ta'i rtsa ba ling+ga la byugs @417b nas dga' bar byas na de bzhin no //
K12D0431_H0415:417b-1: rgyu skar rgyal la dhu tu ra'i rtsa ba dang 'bras bu blangs nas /
K12D0431_H0415:417b-2: rgyu skar skag la shun pa blangs /
K12D0431_H0415:417b-4: nag pa la me tog blangs /
K12D0431_H0415:417b-5: m'u la la rtsa ba blangs la /
K12D0431_H0415:417b-6: cha mnyam por phye mar byas nas /
K12D0431_H0415:417b-7: sbrang dang ril bu byas nas ras spangs te bskam por bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:417b-8: go la byin nas phye ma yis dbang du byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:417b-9: khyi smyon pa'i rkang pa g-yas pa'i sor mo sol
K12D0431_H0415:417b-10: ba'i me la bsregs nas gang gi ming bris te
K12D0431_H0415:417b-12: ces pas de 'ong bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:417b-13: du ba med pa'i me la bsro bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:417b-14: ma y'u ra shi kha dri ma lnga'i bza' ba la sogs pa byin na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:417b-15: aa pa ra dzi ta'i rtsa ba skar ma rgyal la bton nas /
K12D0431_H0415:417b-16: ras la yang dag par bsgos pa'i sdong bus mi'i thod pa la mig sman du bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:417b-17: de'i mig sman gyis skyes pa dang /
K12D0431_H0415:417b-19: danda autpa la'i rtsa ba dang /
K12D0431_H0415:417b-20: dri ma lnga dang byin na dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:417b-22: ta ga ra dang; ru rta chang dang byin na mi 'dod pa nyams par byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:417b-24: n'a ga ge sar phye ma dang /
K12D0431_H0415:417b-26: gi wam rnams kyis mig sman byas na dbang du byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:417b-27: gla ba dang; la dzdza lu dang /
K12D0431_H0415:417b-29: sa ha de ba dang rnams kyis thig le byas na /
K12D0431_H0415:417b-30: 'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed do zhes te /
K12D0431_H0415:418a-2: rang gi ling+ga'i steng du ka ra b'i ra dmar
K12D0431_H0415:418a-3: po'i me tog bzhag nas stong phrag gcig bzlas par
K12D0431_H0415:418a-4: bya'o // ming gi mtha' rten nas so //
K12D0431_H0415:418a-5: gang gi mdun du sngags bzlas nas zangs ma'i khab
K12D0431_H0415:418a-6: kyis phug nas bskor bas de dbang du 'gyur ro
K12D0431_H0415:418a-7: // sngon bsnyen pa stong phrag bcu ming dang bral bar byas nas /
K12D0431_H0415:418a-8: na ma:tsanda li che ge mo ba sh'i ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12D0431_H0415:418a-9: bsnyen pa dang bcas pas dur khrod kyi thal ba
K12D0431_H0415:418a-10: nag po'i bcu bzhi la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par
K12D0431_H0415:418a-11: sngags nas bud med kyi spyi bor byin na dbang
K12D0431_H0415:418a-12: du 'gyur ro // ra'i ling+ga blangs nas rked pa la dur khrod kyi srad bus bcing bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:418a-13: yang na rtsangs pa'i mjug ma bcings na khams 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:418a-14: mchog tu bde ba'i yid gcig pus mee thu na bya ste brtan pa'i sbyor bas so //
K12D0431_H0415:418a-15: rtag tu sems med pa bzhin du gyur nas khams mchog tu 'ching bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:418a-16: m'u lam si ta ko ki la kshya sa /
K12D0431_H0415:418a-17: yang na dhu tu ra gos dang bral zhing 'doms dkris dang bral /
K12D0431_H0415:418a-18: skra grol bas bton nas bcings na khams 'ching bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:418a-19: byi la nag po'i rkang ba'i rus pa bcings na khams 'ching bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:418a-20: sha ra pung sh'a dkar po'i rtsa bas bcings na'ang khams 'ching bar byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:418a-22: gol la gal te na su ra sun na ka
K12D0431_H0415:418a-23: zos nas me thu na sngon bzhin byas na khams
K12D0431_H0415:418b-0: 'ching ba'i mchog @418b go ;'jam 'bras kyi nang brus
K12D0431_H0415:418b-1: nas dngul chus bkang nas rked pa la bcings na
K12D0431_H0415:418b-3: de bzhin du phag gi tshil gyis aar ka'i bal
K12D0431_H0415:418b-4: dkar po la sdong bu byas nas mig sman byas
K12D0431_H0415:418b-6: sa'i 'khri shing gi phye mas sdong bu la til gyi 'bru mar bsreg par bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:418b-8: sa'i 'khri shing phye mar byas nas til gyi 'bru mar gur gum gyi mar khu dang btsos nas /
K12D0431_H0415:418b-9: de yis rkang pa la mnyes na khams 'ching ngo //
K12D0431_H0415:418b-11: sdig pa dag ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar nas des rkang pa la byugs na khams 'ching ngo //
K12D0431_H0415:418b-12: k'a ka dzi gha dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /
K12D0431_H0415:418b-13: padma dkar po ke shar sbrang dang lte bar byugs na khams 'dzin no //
K12D0431_H0415:418b-14: glang gi rva gyen du skyes pa blangs nas brdar te /
K12D0431_H0415:418b-15: ling+ga la byugs na ling+ga gyen du byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:418b-16: ka pi katstsha rtsa bdar nas ra'i chu dang btags
K12D0431_H0415:418b-17: nas ling+ga la byugs nas mnyes na 'phrang por byed
K12D0431_H0415:418b-20: chu dron mos bkrus na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:418b-21: 'gron bu'i nang du dngul chus bkang nas khar bcug na khams 'ching ngo //
K12D0431_H0415:418b-23: ainda b'a ru n'i nyi ma bdun du spang bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:418b-24: des mnyes na ling+ga gyen du byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:418b-25: do sha ni'i rtsa ba dang /
K12D0431_H0415:418b-26: ka ma tsi'i rtsa ba dang /
K12D0431_H0415:418b-27: dhu tu ra'i sa bon dang /
K12D0431_H0415:418b-28: ka stur dang mnyes nas ling+ga la byugs nas bud med la 'khrig pa bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:419a-3: gho sha'i phye ma sbrang dang byugs na 'ang de bzhin no //
K12D0431_H0415:419a-5: sbrang ling+ga la byugs nas 'dod pa byas na bud med 'dzag par byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:419a-6: ka ma rtsi'i rtsa ba dang /
K12D0431_H0415:419a-7: go la bud med dang dga' ba'i dus su zos na de 'dzag par byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:419a-10: rgyam tsha dang bsres nas rang gi mdzub mo la byugs nas /
K12D0431_H0415:419a-11: de'i bha ga'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i
K12D0431_H0415:419a-12: rtsal ji srid bskyod pas de 'dzag par byed do
K12D0431_H0415:419a-15: dngul chu dang; ha sti bi pi ling dang /
K12D0431_H0415:419a-16: sbrang gis byugs pas bud med 'dzag par byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:419a-17: r'a ma du ti'i rtsa ba dang /
K12D0431_H0415:419a-18: 'o ma dang bcas pa ling+ga mnyes nas mee thu na byas pas bud med 'dzag par byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:419a-19: dza yanti'i rtsa ba dang btags nas 'bras kyi chu
K12D0431_H0415:419a-20: dang bsres nas rdul dang ldan pa'i skye gnas la
K12D0431_H0415:419a-21: byugs na mo gsham du the tshom mi za'o //
K12D0431_H0415:419a-22: pa la sha'i sa bon mnyes nas byugs nas /
K12D0431_H0415:419a-24: mar gsar ba'i btung ba dang /
K12D0431_H0415:419a-25: tsi tra dmar pos mo gsham du the tshom med do //
K12D0431_H0415:419a-27: phye ma leb kyi phye mas skyes gnas lhod pa la byin na mkhrang por 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:419a-28: zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs
K12D0431_H0415:419a-29: pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las
K12D0431_H0415:419b-0: / khams bcing @419b ba la sogs pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu dgu pa'o ////
K12D0431_H0415:419b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12D0431_H0415:419b-3: sna tshogs dbye ba gsungs pa dang //
K12D0431_H0415:419b-4: khyab bdag de bzhin ngo mtshar dang //
K12D0431_H0415:419b-5: rlung gi sbyor ba ma lus dang //
K12D0431_H0415:419b-6: de bzhin dus kyi mtshan nyid dang //
K12D0431_H0415:419b-7: gzhan yang bdag ni mnyan par 'tshal //
K12D0431_H0415:419b-9: da lta bka' drin mdzad du gsol //
K12D0431_H0415:419b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0431_H0415:419b-11: lha mo legs so legs mdzad nas //
K12D0431_H0415:419b-12: gang 'dir khyod kyis gsol btab pa //
K12D0431_H0415:419b-13: kun gyi rnam par shes bsdus pa //
K12D0431_H0415:419b-14: de nas bdag gis rab bshad bya //
K12D0431_H0415:419b-15: aom dz'a la ka r'a la ba da ne /
K12D0431_H0415:419b-24: spho ta ya spho ta ya /
K12D0431_H0415:419b-26: yam sho sha ya sho sha ya h'um phat/
K12D0431_H0415:419b-27: sngags 'di bzlas nas nam mkha' la khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya'o //
K12D0431_H0415:419b-28: rlung dang sprin la sogs pa 'jigs par byed do //
K12D0431_H0415:419b-29: aom phe ta ka ra phem phem ha ha h'a h'a phat/
K12D0431_H0415:419b-30: dur khrod du rol pa'i sngags so aom sarbba bi dy'a [?] dhi pa ta ye /
K12D0431_H0415:419b-32: n'a sha ya sarbba d'a ki n'i n'am/
K12D0431_H0415:419b-33: t'a sa ya t'a sa ya /
K12D0431_H0415:419b-34: ban dha ya ban dha ya /
K12D0431_H0415:419b-35: mu kham k'i la ya k'i la ya /
K12D0431_H0415:420a-0: ces pa ni grong khyer du 'jug @420a *//
K12D0431_H0415:420a-2: aom hi li hi li ha phu:phu:zhes pa 'dis sa
K12D0431_H0415:420a-3: la mngon par bsngags nas rdul gyis gtor na sbrul
K12D0431_H0415:420a-6: zhes brjod na stag 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:420a-8: zhes pa 'dis glang po che 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:420a-9: te la li a'a he la li a'a /
K12D0431_H0415:420a-11: aom hr'im ba tu ka n'a th'a tsanda mah'a ro sha na h'um phat/
K12D0431_H0415:420a-12: zhes pas lag pa g-yon pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis brdungs pas khyi 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:420a-13: aom ya m'anta ka hr'i:h'um h'um phat phat/
K12D0431_H0415:420a-14: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya; tsanda pra tsanda h'um phat/
K12D0431_H0415:420a-15: zhes pa 'dis ma he 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:420a-16: aom ya ma mrda ne marda ya marda ya /
K12D0431_H0415:420a-17: aom tsanda mah'a ro sha na h'um phat/
K12D0431_H0415:420a-18: ces pa 'dis sdig pa'i nad 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12D0431_H0415:420a-19: aom kro dha ne sam kro dha ni be dha n'a ya h'um phat/
K12D0431_H0415:420a-20: chu la mngon par sngags nas byin na zug rdu 'byin par 'gyur ro //

K12D0431_H0415:429b-1: shes rab pha rol phyin 'byung ba //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-2: de nas yang dag rab bshad bya //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-3: bcu drug lo yi gzugs ngan ma //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-4: lha mo sems dpa'i skyil krung mdzad //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-5: sku mdog sngon mo skal chen ma //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-6: mi bskyod pa yis dbu la brgyan //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-7: phyag g-yas padma dmar po bsnams //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-8: g-yon pa'i phyag ni rol pa'i stabs //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-9: 'dod pa'i bstan bcos kyis gnas pa //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-10: padma zla ba'i steng du bzhugs //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-11: nu ma rgyas shing lta bas tshim //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-12: spyan yangs dga' ma khyod la smras //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-13: lhan skyes mi g-yo'i ting 'dzin gnas //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-14: lha mo 'di ni sgom par gyis //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-15: h'um yig ye shes las byung ba'i //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-16: sna tshogs rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-18: dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-19: yang na dh'i: yig las byung ba'i //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-20: kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-21: rtag pa yi ni dbu rgyan cing //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-22: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-23: sor mo rin dbang dbu rgyan dang //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-24: dmar po ku ru ku lle'i k'e /
K12D0431_H0415:429b-25: lha mo dbu rgyan 'od dpag med //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-26: hr'i yig ye shes las byung ma //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-27: tam yig ye shes las byung ba'i //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-28: sgrol ma sku mdog ljang gu ni //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-29: don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan ma //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-30: sngon mo'i gzugs kyis skyes bu rnams //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-31: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis gnas nas //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-32: zhi ba'i gzugs kyis yang dag zhugs //
K12D0431_H0415:429b-33: dpal ldan ral gri zhags pa bsnams //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-2: rang rigs yang na gzhan rigs kyi //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-3: bu mo bzung nas bsgom par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-5: the tshom med par dngos grub 'gyur //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-6: yang na sa sogs las bgyis pa'i //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-7: gzugs brnyan byas nas bsgrub par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-8: lhan skyes gtum po'i ting 'dzin gnas //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-9: rtse gcig yid kyis bzlas par bya; ;de la bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-10: aom bi shva badzri a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha h'um sv'ah'a /
K12D0431_H0415:430a-11: aom badzra sa ra sva ti a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha dh'i:sv'ah'a /
K12D0431_H0415:430a-12: aom badzra dh'i tva shva ri a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha bam sv'ah'a /
K12D0431_H0415:430a-13: aom ku ru ku lle a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha hr'i:sv'ah'a /
K12D0431_H0415:430a-14: aom t'a re a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha t'am sv'ah'a /
K12D0431_H0415:430a-15: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-16: dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor la //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-17: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-18: rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa la //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-19: kha dog ser por byas pa la //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-21: de yang me yi 'dab ma dkar //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-22: bden bral du ni dmar por mtshungs //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-23: rlung du kha dog ser po ste; ;dbang ldan mtshams su ljang gu'o //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-24: dbus su kha dog nag po ste //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-25: de la mi g-yo rtag par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-26: yang na nyi ma'i steng gnas pa'i //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-27: dkar po ser po dmar po'am //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-28: ljang gu sangs rgyas lnga rnams kyi //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-29: sku ru rnam par bsam par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-30: me yi mtshams su sbyan ma ste //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-31: ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang mtshungs //
K12D0431_H0415:430a-32: g-yon dang g-yas pa'i phyag dag gis /
K12D0431_H0415:430b-0: @430b zla ba mya ngan med shing bsnams //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-1: bden bral lha mo gos dkar mo //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-2: gzhu dang mda' ni phyag bsnams ser //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-3: rlung gi mtshams su m'a ma k'i /
K12D0431_H0415:430b-4: sku mdog dmar mor gyur pa ni //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-5: bum pa 'bras kyi snye ma phyag /
K12D0431_H0415:430b-6: dbang ldan mtshams su sgrol ma ste //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-7: ljang gu g-yas pa mchog sbyin dang //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-8: g-yon pa autpal sngon po bsnams //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-9: de rnams zla ba'i gdan la ni //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-10: thams cad skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-11: shar sgo brgya byin gdan la ni //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-12: 'dod chags rdo rje dgod par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-13: ral gri thod bsnams sku mdog dmar //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-14: lho ru gshin rje'i gdan la ni //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-15: zhe sdang rdo rje sku mdog nag /
K12D0431_H0415:430b-16: gri gug dang ni sdig mdzub phyag /
K12D0431_H0415:430b-17: nub tu rma bya'i gos can gyi //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-18: chu bdag steng nas ljang gu yis //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-19: nga rgyal rdo rje zhes bya ba //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-20: rdo rje rgyas pa phyag na bsnams //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-21: byang du gti mug rdo rje ni //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-22: sdig mdzub aa sho ka bsnams pa //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-23: lus ngan ser po la gnas pa'i //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-24: nyi ma'i gdan la dgod par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-25: thams cad g-yon brkyang rkang stabs can //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-26: khro zhing skra ni gyen du brdzes //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-27: kha dog ser por mtshungs pa yi //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-28: mtshams bzhi la ni bum pa dgod //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-29: rnal 'byor ma brgyad dang ldan pa //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-30: 'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-31: 'jig rten gsum gnas bud med kyi //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-32: bdag po dbang phyug dam par bcas //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-33: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya //
K12D0431_H0415:430b-34: gtum po khro bo bsgom pa ni //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-2: gtum po khro bo brtag par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-4: me ste bden bral mtshams su ni //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-5: 'dod pa'i lha ste kha dog ser //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-6: maha'i nam zhes kha dog ljang //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-7: rlung ste lha min ko ki la //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-8: zhes pa gri gug thod pa'i lag /
K12D0431_H0415:431a-9: nag po dbang ldan mtshams su gnas //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-10: thams cad g-yas brkyang stabs kyis so //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-11: lha mo parna sha ba ri //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi nub phyogs gnas //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-13: 'di nyid bsam gtan sbyor ba yis //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-14: nya sogs bsregs pas mchod par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-15: lha rnams kun kyang 'chi byed na //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-16: mi rnams gzhan pa smos ci dgos //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-18: aom tsanda mah'a ro sha na bhandha bhandha che ge mo h'um phat/
K12D0431_H0415:431a-19: shes rab dang ldan bsgom par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-20: g-yon pa'i phyag na padma dkar //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-21: gtum po khro bo sngon po'am //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-22: dmar po yang na nag pos kyang //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-23: rnal 'byor bsgom pa yongs brtan pas //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-25: de ltar mi g-yo dkar po sogs //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-26: 'bad pa drag pos sgom byed na //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-27: sems ni rtse gcig mnyam gzhag pas //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-28: sa bon dang bral nyid kyang bsgom //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-29: za dang 'thung dang nyal ba dang //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-31: gnas skabs kun tu [?] rnal 'byor pas //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-32: lha yi rnam par bsgom par bya //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-33: yang na bde ba 'ba' zhig ni //
K12D0431_H0415:431a-34: phan tshun bde ba'i rnal 'byor ma //
K12D0431_H0415:431b-0: ji @431b srid rab tu gsal gyur pa //
K12D0431_H0415:431b-1: de srid bar du 'bad pas bsgom //
K12D0431_H0415:431b-2: rab gsal gyur na rnal 'byor ba'i //
K12D0431_H0415:431b-3: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo //
K12D0431_H0415:431b-4: zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs
K12D0431_H0415:431b-5: pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las
K12D0431_H0415:431b-6: / lha mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs kyi rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o ////
K12D0431_H0415:431b-7: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12D0431_H0415:431b-9: rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o //
K12D0431_H0415:431b-10: dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so ////
K12D0431_H0415:431b-11: theg pa chen po yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen mkhyen pa dang /
K12D0431_H0415:431b-13: 'phrin las dpag tu med pa mnga' ba bla ma
K12D0431_H0415:431b-14: chen po rin chen rgyal mtshan gyi sku drin la
K12D0431_H0415:431b-15: brten nas / bla ma dus 'khor ba chen po
K12D0431_H0415:431b-16: shes rab seng+ges bskul zhing sbyin bdag mdzad pa la
K12D0431_H0415:431b-17: brten nas dpal ldan sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen
K12D0431_H0415:431b-18: por pandi ta ratna shr'i zhal snga nas /
K12D0431_H0415:431b-19: lotstsha ba grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis sbrul gyi smin
